benefits.title: Access & Discounts
benefits.description: Membership provides access to minor sports such as Soccer and Baseball along with some discounts at City of Edmonton Recreation Facilities

benefits.title: Free Swimming
benefits.description: Each membership grants users several entries into Edmonton Confederation Pool's public swim times for free. Just one more perk of being a member

benefits.title: Neighourhood Decisions
benefits.description: Community leagues are recognized by the City of Edmonton as the primary speaking body for a community. We are independent and our members help determine our priorities

benefits.title: Discounted Hall Rental
benefits.description: Need a place to hold a birthday party? We offer greatly discounted rental rates for our hall to our members
